name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: But I donâ€™t think this is a sign of a shift. On the contrary, it is now further confusing the concepts of the party and the country. All the passages that originally praised the party have been integrated into the concept of the country and China. The party is the country, and the country is the family. This may be the new direction of public opinion propaganda - completely integrating these two concepts.
